channel.title: Project Info
channel.description:
I'm writing this up as a reference should we aquire new devs or just for myself so i dont have to type out emails etc. (feel free to sticky/edit)
Cherokee is currently maintained on Sourceforge at: [url=http://www.sourceforge.net/projects/cherokeeengine]http://www.sourceforge.net/projects/cherokeeengine[/url]
Devs: Moparisthebest Yakman MSN = yakmann@hotmail.co.uk Ferty MSN = MustaKrakish@gmail.com AIM = Harmageddon36 Teh_freak Aid MSN = fuzz19881@hotmail.com Silver Lining MSN = bubbaroids3@hotmail.com
We also ask that all devs register at [url=http://www.assembla.com]http://www.assembla.com[/url] and then notify mopar with your username as that site is hosting our svn and wiki :)
we all are also active in the irc channel for the most part feel free to contact myself or other devs for information :)
Irc channel: irc.moparisthebest.com #cherokee You have to get another member who has op in the channel to invite you.
** Currently Working On ** [s]Writing accessorMethods for rs client 317, sort of a proof of concept :)[/s] The birth of the updater :|

item.title: Project Info
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

As you can see, since Silver Lining seems to have more BCEL updating knowledge than any of the rest of us currently, I have recruited him for the team.

Read full topic
